body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah McGoffin
Gov. of the Commonwealth of Ky
Dear Sir

Your petitioners the undersigned citizens of Union County Ky would state that on the 10th day of October 1861 the honorable Judge of the Union Circuit Court rendered a Judgement of ten Dollars against John Gough Sr charged with the offence of selling liquor ^in quantity less than 1/2 gallon^ to slaves Now we the undersigned citizens of aforesaid believing the Old Man -- John Gough Sr. to be innocent and that said fine is a great hardship do humbly petition your Excellency to remit and discharge said fine Mr Gough is a very poor man and a sacrifice of this property must be made to pay said fine
